::Hevn::
       He nods calmly.  "Yes, I am.  You were once a Maximal known as 
Nightlight.  It was my fault you were captured so I'm here to protect you, no 
matter what.  Even if it means fighting my former comrades."  He looks down 
and stares intensely at his hands.  "You're that important.  Not just to me, 
or anyone else.  But to the future."  He sighs.  "I don't think I can explain 
it.  I just know you are."

--part1_43.1c1c89df.2be4abba_boundary
Content-Type: text/html; charset="US-ASCII"
